alert.note: Alert for Audubon (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 5:48PM CDT until August 07 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Audubon County in west central Iowa... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 548 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Audubon, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Audubon, Audubon County Airport and Exira. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
